EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1335463923.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Josh, I can absolutely accommodate that. I am usually in the office from 9:30 -6:30 ~7ish (it’s a great way to beat traffic.) So after hours would work for me almost any night including tomorrow. Let me know what works for you. Thanks, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Joshua Greenberg [mailto:joshua@crmventures.com] Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2012 1:48 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Thanks Sara, I clicked on the link, but none of your available times work well for me. I get into the office by 830 and leave by 530. I have no cell reception in the office so the ideal would be that we speak some time prior to or after business hours. Do you have a day that could accommodate that? If not, I'l try to find a slot that works around meetings, but currently that has been tough. Thanks, Josh Greenberg | CRM Ventures | (215) 869-3356 | joshua@crmventures.comOn Thu, Apr 26, 2012 at 12:39 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:Hi Josh, Nice to meet you via email, any friend of Deepak’s is a friend of mine, and thank you Kelly for the wonderful introduction. As Kelly mentioned below, you may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by go here. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:joshua@crmventures.com> Kelly Scherer Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2012 12:36 PM To: Joshua Greenberg Cc: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hi Josh Thank you for your email – and I will certainly have to thank Deepak for the glowing compliments! I am actually going to refer you to Sara Conde (who has worked with Deepak Asrani as well), as she is a Consultant Services Advisor here at MBO – her entire focus is on educating Independent Consultants on our service offerings, benefits, etc. I am positive she will be very helpful in taking care of your needs. Unfortunately, tonight, we will both be at a networking event for our local DC consultants, so we will be out of the office at 6. If you would, simply click on the following link, and it will allow you to select a time that works best for you, and Sara will be more than happy to reach out. https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS Thanks again!! Kelly SchererDirector, Associate ServicesDirect: 703-793-6025Toll Free: 800-556-0270 x6025 <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcEJavUJk7u65L6vijzTSbpatqa8zCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Fax: 703-793-6085 <tel:703-793-6085> MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300 Herndon, VA 20171 www.mbopartners.com From: Joshua Greenberg [mailto:joshua@crmventures.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&blocked::http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcEJavUJk7u65L6vijzTSbpatqa8zCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2012 10:01 PM To: Kelly Scherer Subject: MBO Partners Hi Kelly, I was referred to you by a colleague of mine, Deepak Asrani, who raved about you and MBO Partners. I have just started consulting as an independent contractor for a pharma in NJ and wanted get a better understanding of MBO Services and fees (the website is quite a bit vague). Can you email me more in-depth details of your services and a breakdown of the fees? I have lousy cell reception in my office, but can call you around 6pm EST if you're available. Deepak gave me a number for you of 703-793-6025 <tel:703-793-6025>, is that still correct? Regards, Josh Greenberg
